Summary: first one hovered over car for about five seconds,two craft hovered over telephone pole.
divs: Sighting Detailsfirst felt that something was looking and analizing my body.Saw large green hazey round craft instantly appear over car for so many seconds than fly straight up and hover about five thousand feet in the air.Sometime after this saw two white discs hover out side my window that zigzag together than stopped. one went one way and the other went the other way.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Elmira
There was one other sighting in Elmira on or around July 20th 1964
